channel.title: How To Edit Run.bat In Your Client
channel.description: well.. im trying to make my very OWN Client and im ''Done'' my only question is now.. how to edit the run.bat???? :confused: :confused: :confused: i have changed the normal richscape client background to this: [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/s2txmf.jpg[/img] and i changed all of the scripts.. so.. all i need right now is to edit the Run.bat and when i say edit i mean change what stands in there, cuz right now, this stands in there: [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/wvu4wh.jpg[/img] and i would like to change it.. which lead us back to the actual question! How do you do it??? :confused: :confused: :confused: plzzz tell me!!! (if u know)

item.title: How To Edit Run.bat In Your Client
item.dc:creator: @Ruppich Ruppich
item.description:
@Ruppich wrote:

[quote=“B U L L D O G, post:3, topic:208021”]oo ya that was such a good idea…
NO!
n00b!
this stands when i right click>>edit

@ECHO OFF TITLE Client color 0a JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE
so ya!
it is hard![/quote]

Lets not be calling people noobs, eh Mr. How to make your own client.

Rubbish.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Edit Run.bat In Your Client

you got system.outprint or somthink in your class8 which is showing your if: and name

item.title: How To Edit Run.bat In Your Client
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“B U L L D O G, post:1, topic:208021”]well…
im trying to make my very OWN Client and im ‘‘Done’’
my only question is now…
how to edit the run.bat???
i have changed the normal richscape client background to this:

s2txmf.jpg772×528

and i changed all of the scripts…
so…
all i need right now is to edit the
Run.bat and when i say edit i mean change what stands in there, cuz right now, this stands in there:

and i would like to change it…
which lead us back to the actual question! How do you do it??? plzzz tell me!!! (if u know)[/quote]
Its not hard to do firstly get yourself a good run.bat or make your own because the one you showed is SHIT then when you have your run option put in it

CLS echo item 14000 == bla echo item 14001 == bla 1 etc
you get the idea just have make sure you don’t remove the important bits

Read full topic

item.title: How To Edit Run.bat In Your Client
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Code Mr. Code
item.description:
@Mr_Code wrote:

ok search in frame_Sub1 for things such as the id’s that come up, otherwise seach in class 30 sub 2 sub 1 sub 3, and if its not in there… search for swat in all files cuz thats the only other way to find it…

PS: search for swat because if u find swat u will want to change it anyways…

Read full topic

item.title: How To Edit Run.bat In Your Client
item.dc:creator: @Lanthus20 Lanthus20
item.description:
@Lanthus20 wrote:

[quote=“Mrs Extro Limited, post:2, topic:208021”]right click > edit

wow that was so hard.[/quote][quote=“B U L L D O G, post:3, topic:208021”]oo ya that was such a good idea…
NO!
n00b!
this stands when i right click>>edit

@ECHO OFF TITLE Client color 0a JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE
so ya!
it is hard![/quote]

i dont really know how to do this… but id think it would be in a class somewhere, just open up each file and change the original name to your games name, that sould do it, if its not in there somewhere i dont know where it would be.
